name: Atla
headline: We train frontier models to evaluate generative AI
description: Atla helps developers find AI mistakes at scale, so they can build more reliable GenAI applications. Generative AI can only reach its full potential when it consistently produces safe and useful outputs. We train models to catch mistakes, monitor AI performance, and understand critical failure modes.

founders.name: Maurice Burger, Founder
founders.description: Co-founder & CEO of Atla (S23). Startup veteran @ Syrup, Trim, and Merantix. Masters in CS @ University of Pennsylvania. Half an MBA @ Harvard Business School.

founders.name: Roman Engeler, Founder
founders.description: Co-founder & CTO of atla (S23). AI safety researcher @ MATS. MSc. Robotics @ ETH, Stanford, Imperial.

# Frontier AI evaluation models
An accurate and flexible way to evaluate your AI products and ship with confidence.
[Start for freeStart for free](https://www.atla-ai.com/<https:/www.atla-ai.com/sign-up-waitlist>)[Go to docs](https://www.atla-ai.com/<https:/docs.atla-ai.com/introduction>)
## LLMs are unreliable – we can help
01
### Unmatched Accuracy
Our models have top-tier evaluation capabilities, as validated by independent benchmarks. They dramatically outperform off-the-shelf LLMs in agreement with human experts in fields including legal, finance, medicine, and more.
![Decorative video with abstract shapes](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66598898fd13d51606c3215d/668e90f15c89daf30a4029a0_atla-offline-poster%201%201.jpg)
02
### Flexible forcustomization
Our models can be prompted or fine-tuned to align with your unique evaluation criteria. This flexibility empowers the development of reliable AI applications across a broad range of tasks and industries.
![Decorative video with abstract shapes](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66598898fd13d51606c3215d/668d3de7d36704b57d380953_atla-integrate-with-ci-NEW.jpg)
03
### Openness &availability
We lead the market for open-source evaluation models, driving safety and transparency in AI development. Our proprietary flagship models bring unmatched value and latency at their price points.
![Decorative video with abstract shapes](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66598898fd13d51606c3215d/668d3de7aae9d28f0e6aecf4_atla-online-evaluation-NEW.jpg)
### From startups to global enterprises, ambitious builders trust Atla
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66598898fd13d51606c3215d/6672c5f1b63948e95dd2c57a_leya.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66598898fd13d51606c3215d/6672c4b08fb534f34497bb45_inventive.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66598898fd13d51606c3215d/6672c4b09b8ebd9d8989a412_robinAI.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66598898fd13d51606c3215d/6672c4b076bbb3ca1508f19f_elicit.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66598898fd13d51606c3215d/6672c5f1e818bb226e9d2580_topline.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66598898fd13d51606c3215d/6672c4b01b7a70cf856098f8_unless.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66598898fd13d51606c3215d/6672c4b0eee09626e0a1f025_merantix.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66598898fd13d51606c3215d/6672c4b0eee09626e0a1f02e_infinity.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66598898fd13d51606c3215d/6672c5f16a81c1ec75e46390_vw.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66598898fd13d51606c3215d/6672c4b039390ceef6c8af4f_kry.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66598898fd13d51606c3215d/6672c4b069da413a405c87cf_aws.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66598898fd13d51606c3215d/6672c4b0a4067e84ea2f2990_n26.png)
## Know the accuracy of your LLM app
Our AI evaluators allow you to define and measure exactly what matters to you— relevance, correctness, helpfulness, or any custom criteria unique to your application.
01
### Iterate fast with Atla’s evaluators
Test your prompts, retrieval strategy, or model versions with our LLM judges. Automatically score outputs, identify issues, and improve your AI product with our actionable critiques.
![Decorative video with abstract shapes](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66598898fd13d51606c3215d/667eca2cae0d50dcdf6561d0_atla-automate.jpg)
02
### Evaluate changes before they hit production
Integrate our AI evaluators into your CI pipeline. Catch regressions early, ensure consistency, and ship updates with confidence.
![Decorative video with abstract shapes](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66598898fd13d51606c3215d/667eca2c5dc48c3b7228ae85_atla-gain-control.jpg)
03
### Live monitoring and guardrails for production
Deploy guardrails to detect drift, prevent failures, and continuously improve your application’s performance in real-time.
![Decorative video with abstract shapes](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66598898fd13d51606c3215d/667eca2c7cc7eae462dd624e_atla-filter-outputs.jpg)
04
### Get started in seconds
Import our package, add your Atla API key, change a few lines of code, and start using our leading AI evaluation models. Or download our OSS models for deployment in your own environment.
![Decorative video with abstract shapes](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66598898fd13d51606c3215d/6683d95ed2d4a61eaa95a81a_atla-install-in-seconds02.jpg)
## Run evals with our LLM-as-a-Judge
### Get started for free
01
Signup to receive your API key and **$10 in free credits per month.**
02
Use our popular metrics or set custom evaluation criteria for your needs.
03
Change a few lines of code to run our AI evaluators.
[Start for freeStart for free](https://www.atla-ai.com/<https:/www.atla-ai.com/sign-up>)[Go to Docs](https://www.atla-ai.com/<https:/docs.atla-ai.com/introduction>)
### Upgrade to pro
01
Everything in free, then**$30 per 1000 API calls.**
02
Gain access to a dedicated private Slack channel for support.
03
Increased rate limits and discounted pricing.
[UpgradeUpgrade](https://www.atla-ai.com/</contact>)[Go to Docs](https://www.atla-ai.com/<https:/docs.atla-ai.com/introduction>)

Enable accurate auto-evaluations of your generative AI. Ship quickly and confidently.

generated_description:
**Atla: Pioneering the Future of Generative AI Evaluation**

Founded in 2023 and part of Y Combinator's Batch S23, Atla is carving its niche in the generative AI landscape from its base in London, UK. With a team of 12, they’re fundamentally focused on enhancing the reliability and safety of AI outputs through meticulous evaluation processes.

**Mission and Vision**

Atla's mission is straightforward: to train frontier models that can effectively evaluate generative AI. They aim to ensure that generative AI technology reliably produces safe and useful results, addressing one of the critical challenges in AI development today. Initially, Atla positioned itself as a tool to help developers spot AI mistakes at scale, but they've rapidly evolved into a robust platform for evaluating and monitoring AI performance and understanding failure modes.

**What They Do**

Atla builds advanced evaluation models that outperform standard Large Language Models (LLMs) in various specialized fields such as legal, finance, and medicine. Their offerings include:

1. **Selene Mini:** A small yet powerful language model designed specifically for evaluation tasks.
2. **API Access:** Users can quickly integrate Atla's tools into their applications.
3. **Alignment Platform:** A flexible solution that allows developers to customize evaluation criteria according to their specific needs.

The company emphasizes unmatched accuracy, flexibility, and openness, providing transparent and accessible evaluation models that empower users, from startups to enterprises, to build reliable generative AI solutions.

**Practical Features**

Atla isn't just a theoretical framework; it offers practical mechanisms for AI developers:
- **Live Monitoring**: Continuous performance tracking of AI models in production to detect drift and prevent failures.
- **Fast Iteration**: Users can test prompts, model variations, and receive actionable feedback to iteratively improve outputs.
- **CI Integration**: Easy integration into existing Continuous Integration pipelines, enabling automated testing of AI models before deployment.

**Getting Started**

Atla invites users to start for free with an uncomplicated sign-up process that includes $10 in monthly credits for testing out their APIs. For more extensive usage, there's a pro tier available, allowing for greater API limits and support.

**Community Collaboration**

Highlighted by their association with Y Combinator and their notable group partner Harj Taggar, Atla is positioned as a collaborative hub for developers interested in harnessing AI safely and reliably. 

In a world where generative AI's potential is only just beginning to be tapped, Atla stands out as an essential ally for developers aiming to ensure the safety and reliability of their applications while navigating the complex landscape of AI. To learn more or to become part of this revolution, visit [Atla's website](https://www.atla-ai.com/).
